resources.string: Please allow Location Permissions - Google requires this for your phone to scan for another phone’s Bluetooth. We do not use or store your location.
This app needs save files for logs (Debug builds only)
This device does not support BLE
Help stop the spread of COVID-19 using your mobile phone
Your Bluetooth connection can help track your potential COVID-19 exposure.
Unfortunately something went wrong. Please uninstall this application from your device and reinstall it from the app store to correct this error.
Using your phone’s Bluetooth, your phone detects when it’s near another phone running this app. Your phone securely logs when you have been in close contact with other app users.
This is a placeholder paragraph. Here is a example of a inline link to open a webview %s.
This is a placeholder paragraph. Here is a example of a inline link to open an email %s.
This is a placeholder paragraph. Here is a example of a inline link to open an email %s.
I agree to the privacy policy
You’ll receive a text message from *INSERT ORG* with a six-digit code.
Once you get the text, please enter the code on the next screen.
Please enter a valid mobile number
That mobile number has already been used
We\'ve sent a text to %s with a confirmation code. Please enter the six-digit code above.
Select \'Yes\' or \'Allow\' for the next few screens.
Location services must be enabled (always in use) for Bluetooth to work. Location data is not captured, collected or shared by us, for any purpose
We\'ll text you a One-Time Pin (OTP)
Help stop the spread of COVID-19
by keeping your permissions enabled, especially when you are out, on public transport, at work or in public places.
Physical distancing makes a big difference.
Physical distancing can help limit the spread of COVID-19 and reduce the risk of getting sick. If you do venture outside, avoid close contact with others and use this app.
If you are exposed to COVID-19, contact tracers will use the information logged using this app to contact you using the mobile number you registered.
Your app permissions need to be on for this app to work. If they’re off, please go to your device settings and turn them on.
To turn off battery optimiser go to Settings > Apps & Notifications
I am using this app to combat COVID-19! Download it from the Apple App Store or Google Play to join the fight. Find more information on the link below. \n\n
Help flatten the curve faster: invite your family and friends to use the app.
Help stop the virus spread by allowing all permissions
Data has been uploaded to contact tracers
By uploading, you agree to share your proximity data for the past 21 days with OTC. We do not collect any geolocation or personal data.
Application needs location permission in order to work. Do you want to enable location permission?
Your consent is needed for the following:
Store your number in a secured registry
Allow users to provide OTC with information regarding encounters with you, should they be a confirmed or suspected COVID-19 case
Please enter the OTP sent to your mobile phone via sms
Keep push notifications on too, so we can alert you if the app is not scanning.
The one time pin you entered was not correct. Please try again.
An error has occurred. Please try again
Could not reach the server. Please try again
Unfortunately something went wrong. Please try again.
Not able to authorize user. Please try again later or contact support.
Your account has been disabled. Please contact support.
Too many requests. Please try again later.
This app is scanning to keep you safe!
Restart phone if this notification disappears.
Please check app to start scanning again.
Please confirm the code listed below matches the one read out to you by the caller from *INSERT ORG*
*INSERT ORG* will send you a one-time PIN so you can upload your data.
Your data has been successfully uploaded and our contact tracers are working to identify people to check up on in your community.
HAS *INSERT ORG* ASKED YOU TO UPLOAD YOUR DATA?
Don’t tap ‘Next’ unless a contact tracer from *INSERT ORG* has instructed you to do so.
Your data has been uploaded to OTC
